thread.title: New Roku 4’s bells & whistles include one that finds lost remotes
thread.title_full: New Roku 4’s bells & whistles include one that finds lost remotes - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: New Roku 4’s bells & whistles include one that finds lost remotes
text:
Photo: Photos Courtesy Of Roku Roku's newest model, the Roku 4, supports 4K Ultra HD TV, has a faster processors, a redesigned operating system and mobile app and, maybe most importantly, has a built-in remote control finder to locate missing remotes Roku's newest model, the Roku 4, supports 4K Ultra HD TV, has a...
Roku on Tuesday unveiled its latest streaming video device, loaded with new bells and whistles — including one very practical bell that will find a lost remote control. Roku's newest model, the Roku 4, supports 4K Ultra HD TV, has a faster processors, a redesigned operating system and mobile app and, maybe most importantly, has a built-in remote control finder to locate missing remotes Roku's newest model, the Roku 4, supports 4K Ultra HD TV, has a...
Roku on Tuesday unveiled its latest streaming video device, loaded with new bells and whistles — including one very practical bell that will find a lost remote control.
